channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The 29 Best Movies on Max (aka HBO Max) Right Now (July 2024)
item.description: Quad Gods, Dune: Part Two, and Chinatown are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Max this month.

item.title: Bumble users can now report profiles that use AI-generated photos
item.description: Bumble’s new reporting option arrives at a time when, unfortunately, AI-generated photos on dating apps are common © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reser...

item.title: Nike Is Killing the App for Its $350 Self-Tying Sneakers
item.description: After August 6, you won't be able to download the app that controls the Adapt BB, and it won't be getting any more updates.

item.title: Talky social app Airchat gets a major overhaul, making it more like an asynchronous Clubhouse
item.description: The concept of Airchat is fun, especially if you're someone who loves to send voice memos instead of typing out long paragraphs on your phone keyboard...

item.title: 7 Lesser-Known Google Maps Features
item.description: Even if you use Google Maps every day on your phone or on your computer, you might not know about these hidden tricks.

item.title: How Disinformation From a Russian AI Spam Farm Ended up on Top of Google Search Results
item.description: A fake article about Volodymyr Zelensky’s wife buying a $4.8 million Bugatti with US aid was promoted by bots, Russia state media, and pro-Trump influ...

item.title: Openvibe combines Mastodon, Bluesky and Nostr into one social app
item.description: Ahead of these potential competitors comes Openvibe, a simple aggregator for the open social web. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal...

item.title: This Ancient Technology Is Helping Millions Stay Cool
item.description: Cheap, low-energy evaporative cooling devices are keeping water, food, people, and even whole buildings cool across India.
